Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

Class LeaderChoiceController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.LeaderChoiceController
public class LeaderChoiceController
extends Controller
Class that represents the controller of the LeaderChoice page of the game On this page the user must choose two out of four leader cards in order to start the game

    method used to clear all choises made It is performed when clearButton is pressed

    method used to manage the user's choice to discard first leader card It is performed when leaderCard1 button is pressed

    void initialize()
    Main method that initializes the scene within the stage It takes care of setting the background of the scene ,the font of the texts and buttons, and the images on the scene
    private void setLeaderCardImages()
    method used to set the card images based on those actually present in the model
    private void showWaitingSceneForFirstPlayer()
    method used to show a page with a message to player one that he will not have to choose the resources and therefore will have to wait for the choice of the resources of the other players
